languages.text: "Куда исчезла... исчезло то, что стояло перед нами в огне? Я могу поклясться..."
"Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."
languages.original_text: "Куда исчезла... исчезло то, что стояло перед нами в огне? Я могу поклясться..."

traits.locale_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “她在哪儿——它……到哪里去了？那个刚刚东西出现在我们面前，站在火堆里，它去哪了？我发誓……”
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: “她在哪儿——它……到哪里去了？那个刚刚东西出现在我们面前，站在火堆里，它去哪了？我发誓……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Où est-ce que cette... chose a bien pu passer ? Le truc qui se tenait dans le feu devant nous ? J'aurais juré... »
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: « Où est-ce que cette... chose a bien pu passer ? Le truc qui se tenait dans le feu devant nous ? J'aurais juré... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Adónde ha... ido? Lo que estaba ante nosotros, en el fuego. Habría jurado que...».
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Adónde ha... ido? Lo que estaba ante nosotros, en el fuego. Habría jurado que...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女…あれは…どこに行った？火の中で私たちの前に立っていたものは？だって確かに…」
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女…あれは…どこに行った？火の中で私たちの前に立っていたものは？だって確かに…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wo ist sie ... es ... hin? Das Ding, das im Feuer vor uns stand? Ich hätte schwören können ..."
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: "Wo ist sie ... es ... hin? Das Ding, das im Feuer vor uns stand? Ich hätte schwören können ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

languages.text: "O... Şey nereye gitti? Önümüzde, ateşin ortasında duran şey? Gördüğüme kalıbımı basarım."
languages.original_text: "Where did she— it... go? The thing that was standing in front of us in the fire? I could have sworn..."

traits.locale_text: O... Şey nereye gitti? Önümüzde, ateşin ortasında duran şey? Gördüğüme kalıbımı basarım."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
